name: Ocean Fish Crush 2
description:
Ocean Fish Crush 2 is an classic, addictive, funny and an great amazing match-3 puzzle game with adventure experience in underwater world.
HOW TO PLAY:
- Match 3 or more fishes clear fishes.
- Collected fish within the specified number of moves.
- Match 4 fishes can win the 1 lighting.
- Match 5 fishes in cross pattern to generate two cross lightning.
- Match 5 fishes horizontally or vertically can destroy all the same fishes.
